VerifyFunsBar.sql: SELECT a.DataType,a.FeaturesName FROM MK_Info_Features AS a INNER JOIN MK_Type_FunctionList AS b ON b.FeaturesID=a.ID WHERE b.PowerAllotID=(SELECT ID FROM MK_Info_PowerAllot p WHERE p.PowerGroupID = (SELECT PowerGroupID FROM MK_Info_User WHERE UserName = @UserName)AND p.PowerID = @PowerID) AND b.ShowMark='Y' AND a.ShowMark = 'Y' AND b.Status = '1' ORDER BY a.DataType
